00019 #undef MPI_WTIME_IS_GLOBAL

00022 int main(int argc, char ** argv ) {     
00023   int size, rank;
00024   char bFile[50];
00025   bool compressLut=false;
00026   double localTime, totalTime;
00027   double startTime, endTime;
00028   DendroIntL locSz, totalSz;
00029   std::vector<ot::TreeNode> balOct;
00030 
00031   PetscInitialize(&argc,&argv,"options",NULL);
00032   ot::RegisterEvents();
00033 
00034 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00035   int stages[1];
00036   PetscLogStageRegister(&stages[0],"ODACreate");
00037 #endif
00038 
00039   MPI_Comm_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD,&size);
00040   MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD,&rank);
00041   if(argc < 2) {
00042     std::cerr << "Usage: " << argv[0] << "inpfile compressLut[0] " << std::endl;
00043     return -1;
00044   }
00045   if(argc > 2) { compressLut = (bool)(atoi(argv[2]));}
00046 
00047   sprintf(bFile,"%s%d_%d.ot",argv[1],rank,size);        
00048 
00049   if(!rank){
00050     std::cout << " reading  "<<bFile<<std::endl; // Point size
00051   }
00052   ot::readNodesFromFile (bFile,balOct);
00053   if(!rank){
00054     std::cout << " finished reading  "<<bFile<<std::endl; // Point size
00055   }
00056   // compute total inp size and output size
00057   locSz = balOct.size();
00058   par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&locSz, &totalSz, 1, MPI_SUM, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00059   par::Mpi_Reduce<double>(&localTime, &totalTime, 1, MPI_MAX, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00060 
00061   if(!rank) {
00062     std::cout << "# of Balanced Octants: "<< totalSz << std::endl;       
00063   }
00064 
00065   //ODA ...
00066   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);  
00067 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00068   PetscLogStagePush(stages[0]);
00069 #endif
00070   startTime = MPI_Wtime();
00071   assert(!(balOct.empty()));
00072   ot::DA da(balOct, MPI_COMM_WORLD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, compressLut);
00073   endTime = MPI_Wtime();
00074 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00075   PetscLogStagePop();
00076 #endif
00077   balOct.clear();
00078   // compute total inp size and output size
00079   locSz = da.getNodeSize();
00080   localTime = endTime - startTime;
00081   par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&locSz, &totalSz, 1, MPI_SUM, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00082   par::Mpi_Reduce<double>(&localTime, &totalTime, 1, MPI_MAX, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00083 
00084   if(!rank) {
00085     std::cout << "Total # Vertices: "<< totalSz << std::endl;       
00086     std::cout << "Time to build ODA: "<<totalTime << std::endl;
00087   }
00088 
00089   if (!rank) {
00090     std::cout << GRN << "Finalizing ..." << NRM << std::endl;
00091   }
00092 
00093   PetscFinalize();
00094 }//end function
